            |                                       |   WHERE ((((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['residential'::text, 'retail'::text, 'commercial'::text]))) AND ((building IS NULL) OR (building <> ALL (ARRAY['house'::text, 'apartments'::text, 'residential'::text, 'hotel'::text, 'retail'::text, 'supermarket'::text]))) AND ((amenity IS NULL) OR (amenity <> ALL (ARRAY['restaurant'::text, 'pub'::text, 'cafe'::text, 'bar'::text, 'fast_food'::text, 'school'::text, 'hospital'::text, 'bank'::text, 'pharmacy'::text]))) AND (shop IS NULL) AND (tourism IS NULL) AND ((leisure IS NULL) OR (leisure <> ALL (ARRAY['park'::text, 'playground'::text, 'sports_centre'::text, 'swimming_pool'::text, 'golf_course'::text]))) AND ((railway IS NULL) OR (railway <> ALL (ARRAY['station'::text, 'halt'::text, 'platform'::text]))) AND (("natural" IS NULL) OR ("natural" <> ALL (ARRAY['forest'::text, 'water'::text, 'wood'::text, 'grassland'::text, 'scrub'::text]))) AND ((barrier IS NULL) OR (barrier <> ALL (ARRAY['fence'::text, 'wall'::text, 'hedge'::text]))) AND ((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['farmland'::text, 'forest'::text, 'meadow'::text, 'orchard'::text, 'vineyard'::text, 'quarry'::text, 'landfill'::text]))) AND ((man_made IS NULL) OR (man_made <> ALL (ARRAY['water_tower'::text, 'water_works'::text, 'sewage_plant'::text]))) AND ((highway IS NULL) OR (highway <> ALL (ARRAY['footway'::text, 'cycleway'::text, 'path'::text, 'steps'::text]))) AND ((railway IS NULL) OR (railway <> ALL (ARRAY['abandoned'::text, 'disused'::text])))) OR ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%airbus%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%boeing%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%rolls royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae systems%'::text)) OR ((lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text))) OR (landuse = 'industrial'::text) OR (building = ANY (ARRAY['industrial'::text, 'warehouse'::text, 'factory'::text, 'manufacture'::text])) OR (man_made = ANY (ARRAY['works'::text, 'factory'::text])) OR (industrial IS NOT NULL) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['company'::text, 'research'::text, 'engineering'::text]))));

            |                                       |    FROM planet_osm_point             |                                       |   WHERE ((((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['residential'::text, 'retail'::text, 'commercial'::text]))) AND ((amenity IS NULL) OR (amenity <> ALL (ARRAY['restaurant'::text, 'pub'::text, 'cafe'::text, 'bar'::text, 'fast_food'::text, 'school'::text, 'hospital'::text, 'bank'::text, 'pharmacy'::text]))) AND (shop IS NULL) AND (tourism IS NULL) AND ((leisure IS NULL) OR (leisure <> ALL (ARRAY['park'::text, 'playground'::text, 'sports_centre'::text, 'swimming_pool'::text, 'golf_course'::text]))) AND ((railway IS NULL) OR (railway <> ALL (ARRAY['station'::text, 'halt'::text, 'platform'::text]))) AND (("natural" IS NULL) OR ("natural" <> ALL (ARRAY['forest'::text, 'water'::text, 'wood'::text, 'grassland'::text, 'scrub'::text]))) AND ((barrier IS NULL) OR (barrier <> ALL (ARRAY['fence'::text, 'wall'::text, 'hedge'::text]))) AND ((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['farmland'::text, 'forest'::text, 'meadow'::text, 'orchard'::text, 'vineyard'::text, 'quarry'::text, 'landfill'::text]))) AND ((man_made IS NULL) OR (man_made <> ALL (ARRAY['water_tower'::text, 'water_works'::text, 'sewage_plant'::text]))) AND ((amenity IS NULL) OR (amenity <> ALL (ARRAY['restaurant'::text, 'pub'::text, 'cafe'::text, 'bar'::text, 'fast_food'::text, 'fuel'::text, 'parking'::text]))) AND (shop IS NULL) AND (tourism IS NULL)) OR ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%airbus%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%boeing%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%rolls royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae systems%'::text)) OR ((lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text))) OR (landuse = 'industrial'::text) OR (man_made = ANY (ARRAY['works'::text, 'factory'::text])) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['company'::text, 'research'::text, 'engineering'::text]))));

            |                                       |             WHEN ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%airbus%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%boeing%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%rolls royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%safran%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%leonardo%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%thales%'::text)) OR ((lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text))) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['aerospace'::text, 'aviation'::text]))) THEN 100  +
            |                                       |             WHEN ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%defense%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%defence%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%military%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%radar%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%missile%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%weapons%'::text)) OR (military IS NOT NULL) OR (landuse = 'military'::text)) THEN 80             |                                       |             WHEN ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%engineering%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%technology%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%systems%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%electronics%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%precision%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%advanced%'::text)) OR (man_made = ANY (ARRAY['works'::text, 'factory'::text])) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['engineering'::text, 'research'::text, 'technology'::text]))) THEN 70             |                                       |             WHEN (landuse = 'industrial'::text) THEN 50                                                                                                                                             +
            |                                       |             WHEN ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%research%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%development%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%laboratory%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%institute%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%university%'::text)) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['research'::text, 'engineering'::text])) OR (amenity = ANY (ARRAY['research_institute'::text, 'university'::text]))) THEN 60 royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae systems%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%leonardo%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%thales%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%safran%'::text))             |                                       |   WHERE ((((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['residential'::text, 'retail'::text, 'commercial'::text]))) AND ((building IS NULL) OR (building <> ALL (ARRAY['house'::text, 'apartments'::text, 'residential'::text, 'hotel'::text, 'retail'::text, 'supermarket'::text]))) AND ((amenity IS NULL) OR (amenity <> ALL (ARRAY['restaurant'::text, 'pub'::text, 'cafe'::text, 'bar'::text, 'fast_food'::text, 'school'::text, 'hospital'::text, 'bank'::text, 'pharmacy'::text]))) AND (shop IS NULL) AND (tourism IS NULL) AND ((leisure IS NULL) OR (leisure <> ALL (ARRAY['park'::text, 'playground'::text, 'sports_centre'::text, 'swimming_pool'::text, 'golf_course'::text]))) AND ((railway IS NULL) OR (railway <> ALL (ARRAY['station'::text, 'halt'::text, 'platform'::text]))) AND (("natural" IS NULL) OR ("natural" <> ALL (ARRAY['forest'::text, 'water'::text, 'wood'::text, 'grassland'::text, 'scrub'::text]))) AND ((barrier IS NULL) OR (barrier <> ALL (ARRAY['fence'::text, 'wall'::text, 'hedge'::text]))) AND ((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['farmland'::text, 'forest'::text, 'meadow'::text, 'orchard'::text, 'vineyard'::text, 'quarry'::text, 'landfill'::text]))) AND ((man_made IS NULL) OR (man_made <> ALL (ARRAY['water_tower'::text, 'water_works'::text, 'sewage_plant'::text]))) AND ((building IS NULL) OR (building <> ALL (ARRAY['house'::text, 'apartments'::text, 'residential'::text]))) AND ((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['residential'::text, 'farmland'::text, 'forest'::text])))) OR ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%airbus%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%boeing%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%rolls royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae systems%'::text)) OR ((lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text))) OR (landuse = 'industrial'::text) OR (building = ANY (ARRAY['industrial'::text, 'warehouse'::text, 'factory'::text, 'manufacture'::text])) OR (man_made = ANY (ARRAY['works'::text, 'factory'::text])) OR (industrial IS NOT NULL) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['company'::text, 'research'::text, 'engineering'::text]))));

            |                                       |   WHERE ((((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['residential'::text, 'retail'::text, 'commercial'::text]))) AND ((building IS NULL) OR (building <> ALL (ARRAY['house'::text, 'apartments'::text, 'residential'::text, 'hotel'::text, 'retail'::text, 'supermarket'::text]))) AND ((amenity IS NULL) OR (amenity <> ALL (ARRAY['restaurant'::text, 'pub'::text, 'cafe'::text, 'bar'::text, 'fast_food'::text, 'school'::text, 'hospital'::text, 'bank'::text, 'pharmacy'::text]))) AND (shop IS NULL) AND (tourism IS NULL) AND ((leisure IS NULL) OR (leisure <> ALL (ARRAY['park'::text, 'playground'::text, 'sports_centre'::text, 'swimming_pool'::text, 'golf_course'::text]))) AND ((railway IS NULL) OR (railway <> ALL (ARRAY['station'::text, 'halt'::text, 'platform'::text]))) AND (("natural" IS NULL) OR ("natural" <> ALL (ARRAY['forest'::text, 'water'::text, 'wood'::text, 'grassland'::text, 'scrub'::text]))) AND ((barrier IS NULL) OR (barrier <> ALL (ARRAY['fence'::text, 'wall'::text, 'hedge'::text]))) AND ((landuse IS NULL) OR (landuse <> ALL (ARRAY['farmland'::text, 'forest'::text, 'meadow'::text, 'orchard'::text, 'vineyard'::text, 'quarry'::text, 'landfill'::text]))) AND ((man_made IS NULL) OR (man_made <> ALL (ARRAY['water_tower'::text, 'water_works'::text, 'sewage_plant'::text])))) OR ((lower(name) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%airbus%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%boeing%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%rolls royce%'::text)) OR (lower(name) ~~ lower('%bae systems%'::text)) OR ((lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aerospace%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aviation%'::text)) OR (lower(operator) ~~ lower('%aircraft%'::text))) OR (landuse = 'industrial'::text) OR (building = ANY (ARRAY['industrial'::text, 'warehouse'::text, 'factory'::text, 'manufacture'::text])) OR (man_made = ANY (ARRAY['works'::text, 'factory'::text])) OR (industrial IS NOT NULL) OR (office = ANY (ARRAY['company'::text, 'research'::text, 'engineering'::text]))));
